articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Brazilian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Brazilian Ambassador
Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Roberto Colin, Brazilian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Sudan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Sudan
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir, president of the Republic of Sudan, on the occasion of the day of the Sudan revolution.
					 The message wished the Sudanese president big success in his work for the stability and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Burundi
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Burundi
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Pierre Nkurunziza, president of the Republic of Burundi, on the 54th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message sincerely wished the Burundian president bigger success in his work for the prosperity of the country and the people's wellbeing, expressing belief that the long-standing good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Spokesman for Committee for Peaceful Reunification Urges U.S. to Make Right Option
articles.content:
Spokesman for Committee for Peaceful Reunification Urges U.S. to Make Right Option
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10 that shot up to space strikingly demonstrating the tremendous defence capabilities of the DPRK is sparking quite a stir among the world public.
					 However, the U.S. steeped in the bad blood toward the DPRK to the marrow of its bones, branded this event as "a violation of UN resolutions" and "serious provocation against peace" with which the Japanese reactionaries and other riff-raffs chimed. The ill-natured Park Geun Hye group also has gone mischievous while making a shrill cry, far from being pleased with the great auspicious event of the nation which the world looked up to with admiration.
					
					 The Park group keeps beating the worn-out drum of sanctions and pressure and even spouts a flurry of senseless rubbish that "the north will face isolation and self-destruction" even though it clearly watches the spirit of the compatriots in the north mounting enough to beat anyone.
					
					 A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK in a statement Thursday said that the DPRK is a nuclear weapons state equipped with smaller, lighter and diversified nuclear warheads and a full-fledged military power equipped with even Korean-style medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket regardless of whether others recognize them or not. The statement went on:
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group should not forget even a moment that the more desperately they resort to such ridiculous farce as sanctions and pressure, the more accurately the ultra-modern strike means of Juche are aiming at them.
					
					 We have already sent ultimatum more than once that we are ready for both dialogue and confrontation.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to properly face up to the strategic position of the DPRK that has undergone a dramatic change and the essence of the changed situation and make a wise choice before it is too late.
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better listen carefully to the DPRK's advice that if they fail to hold the hand of good faith reached out by the DPRK to rewrite the history of reunification while calling the south a companion in reunifying the country and shaping the destiny of the nation, not asking about the past, they will miss the last opportunity of their survival.

articles.title: Documents of DPRK FM Distributed as UN Official Documents
articles.content:
Documents of DPRK FM Distributed as UN Official Documents 
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The answer given by a spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK to the question raised by the KCNA on June 15 as regards the plan mapped out by the U.S. for "precision air raid operation" against the DPRK was distributed as an official document of the UN General Assembly and Security Council A/70/957-S/2016/549 on June 28.
					 The statement made by a spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on June 19 "Ever-increasing nuclear threat of the brigandish U.S. will spark a merciless nuclear retaliation of justice" and the statement made by a spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK on June 16 in connection with the ever more undisguised arms buildup of the U.S. aimed at seizing military edge on the Korean peninsula and in the region were distributed respectively as an official document of the UN Security Council S/2016/558.

articles.title: Special Envoy of First Secretary of C.C., CPC Leaves
articles.content:
Special Envoy of First Secretary of C.C., CPC Leaves
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba (CPC) and vice-president of the Council of State of Cuba, and his party who visited the DPRK as a special envoy of Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the C.C., CPC, left here for home on Thursday.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio Marked
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio marked its 70th founding anniversary.
					 The studio is a national treasure where the courses covered by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the DPRK are vividly recorded on videos.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung guided the work for producing the first documentary film of new Korea "Our Construction" just after the liberation of the country and declared the founding of the studio on July 1, Juche 35 (1946) when the filming finished.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il gave perfect answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in producing the documentary and science films ranging from principles of creation and film-making system of the studio to process of creation, guided thousands of films and made sure that every film recorded the history of the WPK and served as powerful weapons actively contributing to the party's ideological work and the economic and cultural construction.
					
					 Over the past 70 years after its founding, the studio has developed into the reliable group of making films under the leadership of the WPK, successfully fulfilling its mission of recording the revolutionary activities of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 A meeting to mark the anniversary was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday.

articles.title: 70th Anniversary of University of National Economy Marked
articles.content:
70th Anniversary of University of National Economy Marked
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting to mark the 70th anniversary of the foundation of the University of National Economy in the DPRK Thursday.
					 The university, which was founded and has developed under the care of the great leaders, is the highest seat of training administrative and economic workers. It trains leading cadres for state economic management.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the university on July 1, Juche 35(1946) and indicated the road to be followed by it.
					
					 He attended its opening and graduation ceremonies and made significant speeches
					
					 He also taught officials of the university new teaching methods of our style and led its work.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the university several times and took steps to bring about qualitative improvement in the university education work as required by the developing revolution and established a well-organized system for training reserve cadres and developed the university into the pedigree establishment for training state economic management personnel.
					
					 The university has developed into a party cadre-training center with strong educational and scientific force and a firm material and technological foundation and has successfully fulfilled its duty for 70 years since its foundation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Awarded Honorary Medal by Ugandan National Executive Committee
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Awarded Honorary Medal by Ugandan National Executive Committee
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with the Julius K. Nyerere Pan-African Honorary Medal by the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan－African Movement on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 A ceremony of conveying the honorary medal and certificate to Kim Jong Un took place in Kampala on June 22.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were officials and members of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement, Juche idea study organizations and organizations for friendship and solidarity in Uganda and the DPRK ambassador to Uganda and members of his Embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Daniel Rugarama, chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement, said in a speech that Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people and chairman of the WPK, is building an invincible socialist power which remains unfazed by the imperialist allied forces' vicious moves for isolating and stifling the DPRK by successfully carrying forward the cause of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, the great leaders.
					
					 Highly appreciating that Kim Jong Un's great exploits and the foreign policy stand clarified by him at the Seventh Congress of the WPK serve as the guidelines for realizing Pan-Africanism and the cause of global independence, the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement has the honor to award the Pan-African honorary medal symbolizing the exploits of Julius K.Nyerere, former Tanzanian president, who was one of the founders of the Pan-African Movement and made a contribution to the national liberation in colony, independence and peace of the African continent, he noted.
					
					 The honorary medal and certificate were conveyed to the DPRK ambassador.

articles.title: Policy of National Reunification Supported by Nigerian Government
articles.content:
Policy of National Reunification Supported by Nigerian Government
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian government sent a memorandum to the DPRK Embassy in Abuja on June 17 in support of the policies for national reunification advanced by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the historic Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The memorandum in the name of the Nigerian Foreign Ministry said:
					
					 We take special note of the proposal for national reunification set forth at the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 The government of the Federal Republic of Nigeria supports the DPRK in its efforts to reunify the country by the Korean people themselves without interference of outsiders.

articles.title: Rim Un Sim Weightlifter Bags Three Gold Medals
articles.content:
Rim Un Sim Weightlifter Bags Three Gold Medals
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Rim Un Sim, woman weightlifter of the DPRK, bagged three gold medals at the 2016 World Junior Weightlifting Championships which began on in Tbilisi, Georgia June 23.
					 250 men and women weightlifters from about 40 countries and regions including the DPRK, Russia, China, Uzbekistan and Thailand are taking part in the championships.
					
					 Rim Un Sim lifted 105kg in snatch, 135kg in jerk and 240kg in total in the women's 63kg category event to take the first place.
					
					 Meanwhile, Pak Jong Ju won three silver medals after finishing second in snatch, jerk and total standings in the men's 62kg category event.

articles.title: Road Relay, 30km Race Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Road Relay, 30km Race Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Some time ago, road relay and 30km race were held in Pyongyang as part of the Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize.
					 In the men's and women's road relays, the April 25 Sports Team came first. The second place was taken by men of the Pyongyang Sports Team and women of the Kigwancha Sports Team and the third by men of the Amnokgang Sports Team and women of the Kim Chaek University of Technology Sports Team.
					
					 In the 30km race, the April 25 Sports Team took the adult men's and women's titles while the Pyongyang Sports Team and the April 25 Sports Team won the junior men's and women's titles respectively.
					
					 Those who passed the record set by the Korean Athletics Association in the race were qualified for the national youth championship and the 13th People's Games slated for September and October.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Closes
Phyongsong, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize closed with due ceremony at the Phyongsong Stadium on Thursday.
					 South Phyongan Province came first in total standings.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Cha Pyong Yun, vice-chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, sportspersons and working people in Phyongsong City.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Closes
 Hamhung, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize closed with due ceremony in Hamhung on Thursday. It opened on June 2.
					  The April 25 Sports Team came first in total standings.

articles.title: Pyongyang Sports Apparatus Factory
articles.content:
Pyongyang Sports Apparatus Factory
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The newly-built Pyongyang Sports Apparatus Factory in the sports village of Chongchun Street, Pyongyang, the DPRK started the production of scores of kinds of quality sports apparatuses, including "Taesongsan"-branded football, basketball, volleyball and boxing gloves.
					 The factory is equipped with modern facilities with an integrated production and strict quality control systems, thus putting the production and management on an IT and modern basis.
					
					 According to Jang Sok Ha, manager of the factory, it sets it as a goal to improve technical knowledge and skills of employees, increase the proportion of locally available raw and other materials, produce a richer variety of apparatuses and raise their quality up to world standards.
					
					 He said that the factory would make contribution to building a sports power by producing more quality sports apparatuses in high demand.

articles.title: Flood Control System for River Taedong Established
articles.content:
Flood Control System for River Taedong Established
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A new flood control system for the Taedong River was established in the DPRK.
					 According to Kim Chang Song, department director of the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport, the system consists of real-time data transmission system, DSS (decision support system), automatic lock control system, monitoring system, etc.
					
					 Through the new control system, the Taedonggang flood-control headquarters is informed of data on water level and lock situation of reservoirs and hydraulic power stations in the river basin at intervals of one minute and precipitation from hydro-meteorological observatories at intervals of ten minutes.
					
					 All lock gates along the river are under full control of the headquarters.
					
					 It is considered that the system will help minimize flood damage in the river basin.

articles.title: Front-Supporting Movements Conducted by DPRK Citizens in 1950s
articles.content:
Front-Supporting Movements Conducted by DPRK Citizens in 1950s 
Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- In the period of the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War, various mass movements had been vigorously conducted among the DPRK people to support the front.
					 The first movement was for donating funds for weaponry.
					
					 In response to the call of Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Il Sung, all the people of the country--workers, peasants, students, patriotic businessmen and little children--turned out as one in a campaign to provide war planes, tanks and ships to the front.
					
					Their donation funds totaled to 174,497,000-won (in Korean currency) one month after the start of the war on June 25, 1950, and ran into at least 400 million-won at the end of August.
					
					 The civilians also launched a movement for offering comforts and inspiring letters to the KPA soldiers on the front.
					
					Pyongyang citizens had sent 100,000 comfort articles and inhabitants of Hwanghae Province 244,000 articles and 114,000 letters to the front until June 30, 1950.
					
					 Meanwhile, a campaign for donating relief grains to the front was launched among peasants. This campaign developed rapidly into an all-people movement when Kim Il Sung sent a letter of thanks to eight peasants of South Phyongan Province in November 1952, after receiving a joint letter they presented to him along with their donation of relief rice to the front.
					
					 During the war inhabitants across the country had also carried munitions and foods to the KPA soldiers on the front battles, encouraging them to heroic feats.
					
					 Such movements were a vivid expression of the DPRK people's intense loyalty to their leader and ardent patriotism as well as their firm confidence in sure victory.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces S. Korean Chief Executive's Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces S. Korean Chief Executive's Invectives against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive spouted a litany of rhetoric at a recent "state council meeting" that the "north is attempting abduction and terrorism" and she is "concerned about the north's possible terrorism linked with an international terrorist organization". She cried out for "taking thorough measures".
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson on Thursday says this is a revelation of a cynical ploy to tarnish the dignity and image of the DPRK winning one victory after another and intensify the domestically and internationally censured and denounced campaign for pressurizing it.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean chief executive is pulling up the DPRK with above-said rhetoric but it is none other than she and her group which are chiefly to blame for terrorism and abduction.
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness for the chief executive of south Korea to talk about what she called "terrorism" and "abduction" and cry out for "taking thorough measures." What she uttered is a ridiculous jargon to escape from the domestic and foreign public criticism of her gangsters' allurement and abduction of citizens of the DPRK.
					
					 She had better stop wagging her tongue recklessly and behave with proper sense and understanding of the reality and do something helpful to improving the north-south relations in a responsible manner.

articles.title: Enlarged Meeting of Chongryon Central Committee Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Meeting of Chongryon Central Committee Held
Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The enlarged meeting of the third session of the 23rd Central Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) was held at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on June 27.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and its vice-chairmen, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, members and advisers of the Central Standing Committee, permanent adviser of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, members of the Central Committee and members of the Central Audit Committee.
					
					 Discussed at the meeting was the first agenda item "On opening up the new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan by dint of single-minded unity of the ranks of Chongryon and on the compatriots-first principle by thoroughly carrying out the important letter with the honor of having held the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un at the top post of the Juche cause".
					
					 Ho Jong Man in a report of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon said that the important letter sent by the Marshal on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon serves as an encyclopedia and immortal great programme as it comprehensively deals with the tasks and ways of opening up the new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan by carrying out the last instructions of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He called on all the Chongryon officials including the members of its Central Committee to turn out as one in the drive for opening up as soon as possible the new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan in the great Kim Jong Un's era, braving any hardships and obstacles.
					
					 The speakers said that all the units would thoroughly embody the basic spirit of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea in the movement of Koreans in Japan and conduct the general advance to thoroughly carry out the five-point tasks clarified at the important letter sent by the Marshal.
					
					 The report of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon was adopted as a decision of the enlarged meeting of the Central Committee of Chongryon.
					
					 The second agenda item was discussed.
					
					 Pak Ku Ho was dismissed from the post of vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and transferred to the post of the director general of the Choson Sinbo of Chongryon and O Min Hak was appointed as vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and concurrently director of its Economic Department.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Enlarged Meeting of 3rd Session of 23rd Central Committee of Chongryon
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Enlarged Meeting of 3rd Session of 23rd Central Committee of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The respected Marshal Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the enlarged meeting of the 3rd session of the 23rd Central Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on June 27.
					 The letter said that the enlarged meeting of the Central Committee discussed and decided tasks and measures for effecting fresh innovation and surge in the patriotic movement by braving difficulties by dint of the single-minded unity of the ranks of Chongryon and on the compatriot-first principle with the honor of having held Marshal Kim Jong Un as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The participants in the meeting noted that they are hardening their determination to conduct all-out drive for carrying out the May 25, 2015 letter sent by the Marshal in an all-round way and bring earlier the new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan in the great Kim Jong Un's era without fail, the letter noted, and continued:
					
					 We will drastically intensify the work of establishing the ideological and leadership system of Juche in Chongryon organizations, organize all work of Chongryon as instructed by the great leaders, thoroughly embody your idea and leadership in Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan and thus devotedly safeguard your high authority.
					
					 We will remarkably intensify the ideological work and the information and agitation drive to make officials and compatriots fully display their mental power and warm patriotic zeal and thus dynamically advance the patriotic movement by dint of ideology despite manifold difficulties.
					
					 We will make tangible contribution to opening up the avenue to national reunification, cherished desire of all the Koreans, true to the line and policies for national reunification advanced by you, actively contribute to the building of a socialist power in the homeland and conduct external activities with the Japanese people in a more positive way.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Ignite Nuclear War Denounced by Koreans in China
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Ignite Nuclear War Denounced by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Koreans in China expressed their will to turn out in the struggle for frustrating the U.S. moves to ignite a nuclear war.
					 The spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on June 22 warned the U.S. not to recklessly move if it wants to evade a nuclear attack by the DPRK which has emerged as a nuclear power in the East.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Though peace is dear to Juche Korea, it doesn't want to get it by begging and mercy, and if one seeks to wreck its peace, it will immediately and mercilessly make a preemptive attack of its own style on the one no matter where and who the one is.
					
					 The service personnel and people of Juche Korea are dynamically advancing toward the victory under the guidance of a peerlessly great man. The U.S. should bear in mind that if it persists in running riot, defying that reality, it will only bring disasters to itself.
					
					 The Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on June 23 said that the situation on the Korean peninsula has been pushed to the brink of a nuclear war, due to the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. should drop its anachronistic wild dream, understanding that the DPRK has long put the U.S. mainland and supply bases for aggression in the range of its precision strike, the statement added.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Intimidation against DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Intimidation against DPRK Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China released a statement on June 30 in denunciation of the U.S. nuclear intimidation against the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the U.S. is staging drills simulating a sudden attack on the nuclear facilities of the DPRK after introducing all nuclear strike means into south Korea. It went on:
					
					 This is dangerous as it is a revelation of the U.S. foolish and vicious plots to check the remarkable advances of the DPRK.
					
					 All members of the federation will dynamically struggle for peace and reunification of the country and against the U.S. nuclear threat, keeping pace with the people in the motherland.

articles.title: Successful Test-fire of Hwasong-10 Ballistic Rocket Is Strong Message to U.S.: Koreans Body in U.S.
articles.content:
Successful Test-fire of Hwasong-10 Ballistic Rocket Is Strong Message to U.S.: Koreans Body in U.S.
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. released a commentary on Monday in connection with the DPRK's successful test-fire of the surface-to-surface medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10.
					 As soon as the news of the successful test-fire conducted by the north was spread worldwide, it became a hot topic of media, governments and institutes of the U.S. and other countries and they are busy analyzing its impact, the commentary noted and went on:
					
					 The rocket Hwasong-10 serves as a strong message to the U.S.
					
					 The north clearly showed before the U.S. through the successful test-fire that the "north Korea policy" the latter has pursued in collusion with its allies and its nuclear war drills have become useless as they can no longer pose threat to the former.
					
					 If the U.S. ignites a war against the north, it will keenly experience that the north's warning that it would wipe out the aggressors to the last man is not hot air.
					
					 The high-angle launch conducted by the north is impossible without high technology. So, no country has done so but the north succeeded in it.
					
					 It can be said that by conducting the high-angle launch the north also tested an ICBM without any impact on the security of other countries. 
					
					 The successful test-fire proved the failure of the U.S. "strategic patience" policy.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Angola
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Angola
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Angola on June 24.
					 The editor of the Angolan newspaper Eme was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events such as a remembrance meeting, film show and round-table talks in praise of the revolutionary exploits of the President who made undying contributions to the cause of global independence, with the approach of July 8, the anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- An Ethiopian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Addis Ababa on June 23.
					 MP Nigatu Dagnachew Cherinet, director of the Youth and Sports Department of the Addis Ababa City Administration and chairman of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events such as a remembrance meeting and seminar in praise of the revolutionary career of the President who made great exploits for the times and revolution, on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Hungary
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Hungary
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Budapest on June 24 under the sponsorship of the Hungarian Workers' Party.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and to organize a remembrance meeting, lecture, film show and other political and cultural events on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Benin
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A Beninese national committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Cotonou on June 24.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and organize a remembrance meeting, film show and other political and cultural events on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in UK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in UK
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A British committee for remembering the great Comrade Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in London on June 25.
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize a remembrance meeting, photo exhibition, film show and other events and introduce the works and exploits of the President on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A Bangladeshi committee for remembering the great President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Dhaka on June 25 under the co-sponsorship of political parties, friendship and solidarity organizations and Juche idea study organizations of Bangladesh.
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh who is minister of Civil Aviation and Tourism, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set the memorial period that will last on July 8 and decided to organize political and cultural events such as a remembrance meeting to praise the exploits of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised in Peru, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised in Peru, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting was held in Peru and a film show took place in Nigeria on June 23 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chairperson of the Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk said in a speech that Kim Il Sung is alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but the world progressives.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea and authored many immortal works to leave the valuable ideological and moral treasures for humankind, the chairperson said, and went on:
					
					 The world admires the Korean people enjoying a happy life under the deep care of the state.
					
					 The chairman of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy, the secretary general of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship said that the President embarked upon the road of the revolution in his teens, defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists, built the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and dedicated his all to the victory of the cause of global independence.
					
					 Personages of a Nigerian hospital spoke highly of the President's party-building exploits after watching the Korean film "Kimilsungia, Flower of the Sun".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Meetings and book and photo exhibitions took place on June 17 and 18 in the UK, Norway and Nigeria on the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 16th anniversary of publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Displayed at the venues of those events were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Put on display were books and pictures introducing the struggle of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy praised Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into the party loyal to the idea and leadership of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway said Kim Jong Il made sure that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was published in June 15, 2000, heralding a new era of peace and cooperation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The permanent secretary of the Niger State Local Government in Nigeria and other speakers lauded Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into an invincible party.
					
					 A letter and message to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in the UK and Norway.

articles.title: Foreign Media Laud Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Feats
articles.content:
Foreign Media Laud Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Feats
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried write-ups to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The 21st issue of the Lao newspaper Congtap Pasason Lao carried a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and an article which said:
					
					 There are not a few great men in history who contributed to human progress. But they were not as great as Kim Jong Il who made tremendous contributions to the cause of global independence with his matchless great idea and leadership.
					
					 The Indonesian newspaper International Media on June 18 said:
					
					 The DPRK, once a weak colony was eclipsed in the world arena a century ago, has acquired the dignity as a politico-military power, satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state and makes a leaping progress towards highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 This would be unthinkable without President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the WPK.
					
					 The website of the Communist Party "Communists of Russia" posted a photo of Kim Jong Il on June 19 and an article which said he set it as the most important task to develop the WPK into the leader's party and successfully implemented it.
					
					 The Senegalese newspaper Le Populaire on June 16 carried an article titled "WPK and Kim Jong Il" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The State Radio of Senegal and F.M. 90.5 Radio of Cambodia aired programs praising his party-building exploits on June 16 and 17.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party-building Praised by British Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party-building Praised by British Body
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article praising leader Kim Jong Il's exploits for party-building on its website on June 22, illustrated with his photo.
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il, who started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) 52 years ago, formulated the revolutionary idea of the leader as Kimilsungism and made it the guiding idea of the party with his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and thus developed the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung both in name and reality.
					
					 The appearance of the WPK represents that of a venerable mother, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il's feats and cause for building a revolutionary party of Juche type, a mass party are being creditably carried forward by the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's election to the top post of the party at its historic Seventh Congress helped the WPK always shed its rays as the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party and firmly guarantee the rosy future of Juche Korea.
					
					 Thanks to another outstanding leader the history of victory of the WPK led by the great Generalissimos will be everlasting and the WPK will give fuller play to its dignity and might as an invincible revolutionary party, mother party.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador brasileno
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador brasileno
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 30 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el embajador de la Republica Federativa de Brasil acreditado en Corea, Roberto Colin, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.

articles.title: CRPP exige a EE.UU. tomar opcion correcta
articles.content:
CRPP exige a EE.UU. tomar opcion correcta
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ACNC) -- Esta sacudiendo el mundo entero tambien en estos momentos el espectacular lanzamiento de "Hwasong-10", cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance, que demostro el inagotable poderio de defensa nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Estados Unidos, colmado de la conciencia hostil anti-RPDC, lo califica otra vez de "violacion de la resolucion de la ONU" y "seria provocacion a la paz" y repiten en coro este embuste los reaccionarios japoneses y otros fulanos y menganos. 
					
					La aviesa camarilla de Park Geun-hye tambien se porta mal dando alaridos, lejos de congratularse por el gran acontecimiento jubiloso de la nacion, admirado por todo el mundo. 
					
					Para colmo, se obstina en recrudecer la ya desgastada campana de sancion y presion y sigue soltando maldiciones como "(el Norte) se buscara aislamiento y autodestruccion" aunque esta viendo con ojos propios el gallardo aspecto de la parte connacional que ninguna fuerza podra doblegar.
					
					Apunta asi el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria en su declaracion publicada hoy y prosigue:
					
					Reconozcan o no los otros, la RPDC es el pais poseedor de armas nucleares minimizadas, aligeradas y diversificadas y digna potencia militar que tiene hasta el cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance, desarrollado por el estilo coreano. 
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos no deben olvidar ni un momento que cada vez que ellos recrudezcan su ridicula campana de sancion y presion, seran mas incisivos los autoctonos y sofisticados medios de ataque que les apuntan con toda precision.
					
					La RPDC esta preparada tanto para el dialogo como para el enfrentamiento y ha enviado en varias ocasiones el ultimatum sobre el respecto. 
					
					Estados Unidos debe tomar una opcion sensata, antes de que se haga tarde, al ver correctamente la posicion estrategica de la RPDC cambiada radicalmente y la esencia del cambio de la situacion. 
					
					Les convendria a las autoridades surcoreanas escuchar seriamente el consejo de que se perdera para siempre la oportunidad de cambiar su destino, que se les llego por ultima vez, si no aceptan la buena voluntad de la RPDC de escribir juntos la nueva historia de reunificacion llamandolos sin atenerse a los antecedentes como acompanantes para la reintegracion territorial y la exploracion del destino nacional.

articles.title: MINREX condena hostilidades continuas de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX condena hostilidades continuas de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 29 la siguiente declaracion:
					Prosiguen los actos hostiles de EE.UU. que quiere crear el ambiente internacional de presion a la RPDC cuestionando las medidas de autodefensa de esta para elevar la capacidad de defensa nacional.
					
					EE.UU. acusa el lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-10", cohete balistico estrategico tierra-tierra de mediano y largo alcance, describiendolo como "provocacion", "amenaza" y "violacion". Pero, en realidad, EE.UU. es el autor que provoca y amenaza a la RPDC y viola flagrantemente la ley internacional.
					
					Significa una provocacion la entrada en el Sur de Corea y su contorno del submarino nuclear Mississippi, los bombarderos estrategicos B-52H y otras muchas propiedades estrategicas de EE.UU. Y la amenaza esta en los sucesivos ejercicios de guerra nuclear para atacar a la RPDC que tienen lugar bajo el rotulo de "la operacion de descabezamiento", que toma por su blanco la Direccion de la RPDC, y "la de ocupacion de Pyongyang", etc. 
					
					Como ya hemos aclarado en la carta enviada al secretario general de la ONU, ?donde esta la ley internacional que estipula que la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de cohete balistico constituyen amenaza para la paz y seguridad del mundo?
					
					Estamos tomando una tras otra las medidas para el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear frente a EE.UU. que recurre a la amenaza nuclear y provocacion contra nuestro pais violando flagrantemente la Carta de la ONU y las leyes internacionales. Esto es natural y justo procedimiento de autodefensa.
					
					Por esta razon, no obtiene el visto bueno en la arena internacional el escandalo que estan armando la Casa Blanca, el Departamento de Estado y el Departamento de Defensa de EE.UU.
					
					Entonces, EE.UU. libra ahora la campana internacional para expresar "preocupacion" por el lanzamiento de "Hwasong-10" instigando a los paises satelites.
					
					Algunos paises se suman a ello "publicando la posicion" sin criterio propio y con actitud confusa.
					
					Asi ellos no saben guardar el decoro de Estado soberano y cometen el acto totalmente inutil para la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Observaremos la conducta miserable de esos paises.
					
					La responsabilidad de las catastroficas consecuencias recaera totalmente a EE.UU. y sus satelites.
					
					Es absurda la actitud de EE.UU. que menciona el problema de dialogo obstinandose por otra parte en la campana internacional para aislar y aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					La politica de hostilidad no es compatible con ningun dialogo. Esto es la posicion de nuestro pais.
					
					En lo adelante, la RPDC fortalecera continuamente en lo cuantitativo y cualitativo el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo en correspondencia a las hostilidades de EE.UU.

articles.title: Parten de regreso enviado especial de Raul Castro y su comitiva
articles.content:
Parten de regreso enviado especial de Raul Castro y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ACNC) -- Partieron el dia 30 de esta capital Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y vicepresidente del Consejo de Estado de la Republica de Cuba quien hizo una visita a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en calidad del enviado especial del Primer Secretario del CC del PCC, Raul Castro Ruz, y su comitiva.

articles.title: Distribuidas como documentos oficiales de ONU declaraciones y respuesta de RPDC
articles.content:
Distribuidas como documentos oficiales de ONU declaraciones y respuesta de RPDC
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ACNC) -- La respuesta del portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dada el dia 15 a la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea en relacion con la elaboracion en Estados Unidos del plan de "operacion de ataque aereo de precision" contra la RPDC, fue distribuida el dia 28 como documento oficial A/70/957-S/2016/549 de la Asamblea General y el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					Quedaron repartidas por separado como documento oficial S/2016/558 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU la declaracion del portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC fechada 19 "Los abominables amenaza y chantaje nucleares de bandidesco EE.UU. causaran la justa y despiadada represalia nuclear" y la otra de la cancilleria coreana publicada el dia 16 en relacion con que se impulsa abierta y continuamente en la Peninsula Coreana y la region el incremento armamentista de Estados Unidos para tomar la hegemonia militar.
